related_post.text: Do you think that this is sketchy?```pyPROJECT_ROOT = os.path.dirname(__file__)sys.path.insert(0 os.path.join(PROJECT_ROOT apps'))```Its adding a directory to the python path so that django can find things in altered project structures.https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55435986/howtoaddadjangoapptosettingspyappnameorappnameappsappnameconfigIt is discussed above but some people seem skeptical in their responses
